blog.name: ao3feed-tonystark

blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

summary: Night Terror
title: Night Terror
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2TsL7L2

by UnmaskedPotential

A story in which Tony Stark is awoken in panic by the sound of a fellow teammate in his room late one night. While his PTSD is triggered, he sets it aside in order to aid his befallen teammate. Who has fallen down the rabbit hole with him? And will Tony’s efforts be enough to save them? Post Avengers, featuring a reformed evil doer. :)

Words: 1007, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: The Avengers (Marvel Movies)
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: Graphic Depictions Of Violence
  • Categories: Gen, M/M
  • Characters: Tony Stark, Loki (Marvel), Thanos
  • Relationships: Loki/Tony Stark
  • Additional Tags: PTSD, night terror, Blood, Trauma, Hurt/Comfort, FrostIron - Freeform


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2TsL7L2

summary: When Rhodey Doesn’t Approve of Stony
title: When Rhodey Doesn’t Approve of Stony
body:
{{I wanted to put this in NTBU but I just don’t know if it will fit? But its a funny scene anyway}}

Steve kissed Tony again, gentler this time, sweet and coaxing and tender. “Mmm, Tony, I–”

“Soldier, just what exactly do you think you’re doing?” A new voice interrupted them, entirely disapproving in only the way a superior officer could be and Tony and Steve jumped apart guiltily.

“Colonel Rhodes.” Steve snapped off a salute, stammering a little. “I didn’t see you there.”

“I feel like that’s fairly obvious.” James Rhodes narrowed his eyes suspiciously. “Especially since you were trying to eat Tony’s soul by sucking it up through his mouth. Tones, what in the fuck do you think you’re doing?”

“Easy, honeybear.” Tony looked halfway to wrecked after that kiss, which was a great look on him, but did exactly nothing to lessen the heat of Colonel Rhodes’ glare. “Kisses between consenting adults is perfectly acceptable.”

“I am not consenting!” Rhodes said loudly. “I am not consenting to this kiss! This is a highlyun-consentable kiss, I do not approve!” 

Tony snipped back, “Well I wasn’t kissing you, was I?”

“You are dis-missed, soldier.” the words sounded like a threat from the Colonel and any other time Steve might have balked at it– after all, he might only be a Captain but he was Captain America and he took orders from exactly no one– but one look from Tony’s best friend had him saluting again and mouthing an apology in Tony’s direction before basically running for the door.

“You don’t have to do that, you know.” Tony fussed a little, trying to smooth his hair back down. “Everyone knows you outrank Captain America, you don’t have to swagger around and make a big deal out of it.”

“I don’t have to make a big deal out of the fact that I outrank a man that you hated for most of your life because your dad made sure you knew you’d never measure up?” Rhodey repeated. “Right, because that sounds like something I’m just going to let go.”

summary: Far From Home - dracusfyre - Marvel Cinematic Universe [Archive of Our Own]
title: Far From Home - dracusfyre - Marvel Cinematic Universe [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
Chapters: 6/8
Fandom: Marvel Cinematic Universe
Rating: Not Rated
Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
Relationships: James “Bucky” Barnes/Tony Stark
Characters: James “Bucky” Barnes, Tony Stark, Obadiah Stane, Peter Parker
Additional Tags: Alternate Universe - Medieval, Fake/Pretend Relationship, Tumblr Prompt, Crusades, BAMF Tony Stark, BAMF Bucky Barnes
Summary:

Welcome to my trope mash-up, Medieval AU + Fake Dating, based on an anonymous request from Tumblr. Bucky, fleeing from the sinister organization of assassins known as Hydra, agrees to help kidnapped nobleman Tony get back to his home. Unfortunately, it turns out that fleeing the Holy Land while hiding from both Hydra and the Ten Rings was the easy part…


NEW CHAPTER: “The Courtship Masquerade”

summary: Tony: Good night. Sleep tight. Don’t let the bed bugs bite. Tonight. Imma fight. Till we see the sunlight. Tik Tok. On the...
body:
Tony: Good night. Sleep tight. Don’t let the bed bugs bite. Tonight. Imma fight. Till we see the sunlight. Tik Tok. On the clock. But the party don’t stop.
Stephen: Please behave like an adult for once.

blog.name: lurafita
blog.title: Spidey-enthusiast
blog.description: I just Love Peter Parker

tags: Peter and Shuri are disaster friends
summary: Why Peter and Shuri are not allowed to watch Disney movies together anymore.
title: Why Peter and Shuri are not allowed to watch Disney movies together anymore.
body:
T’Challa, Tony, Shuri and Peter sitting together in the common room one evening, watching Frozen. 

Shuri, turning to Peter: “Do you think Elsa is singing about diarrhea?”

Peter, eyes wide: “Oh my god, you are right!”

Tony, beyond confused: “What-”

T’Challa: “Don’t ask Tony! It’s a trap! Whatever nonsense this is, we won’t be able to ever forget, if you ask! Just ignore it!”

Peter: “It makes so much sense.”

Shuri: “I know, right?”

Tony, opening his mouth: “How-”

T’Challa: “Tony, I’m begging you! Don’t do it!”

Peter: “It’s like I’m seeing the movie for the first time!”

Shuri: “It really gives the whole thing a completely new meaning!”

Tony, never having learned impulse control: “Okay! What the hell are you two talking about?”

T’Challa, defeatedly lying his head in his hands: “Oh god, why?”

Peter and Shuri, a wild grin on their faces, starting to sing: 
“Let it gooo, let it goooo! 
Can’t hold it back anymoooooore.
Let it goooo, let it goooooo!
Turn away and slam that dooooor!
I don’t care, what they’re going to say.
Let the storm rage oooooon!
It’s totally a diarrhea song!”
Then they fall over, laughing manically.

Tony, horrified: “I-”

T’Challa, horrified: “I-”

blog.name: strangemischief
blog.title: What Strange Trickery This Is
blog.description: Ironstrange + Supremefamily | Occasional Thor or Loki Content | Side Blog | Tag List | Ao3

summary: Wolf AU? (Everyone's a wolf)
question: Wolf AU? (Everyone's a wolf)
answer:
I wasn’t sure if you meant werewolves or like…pack wolves? So, I just did werewolves since I had more ideas for that xD Also not everyone is a wolf, sorry.

1. A small, select, group of the world’s population have the mutation. The afflicted, they call them. There isn’t much known about it. And as is often true for the unknown, a cloud of fear and anger circled around them. Some cultures embrace them. Other’s reject them. In some places they’re hunted down, their corpses dangling high like for all to see, not too unlike trophies. Elsewhere, their faces are smothered in blush and eyeshadow, and their bodies are draped in gold so they can be sold as prizes, treasures, to the highest bidder. But no matter where one of the plagued lived, there was one self-imposed rule that stayed the same… 

…never draw attention. 

2. Concealing one’s true nature made for a lonely, isolated, life, but Stephen had fared well thus far. His town in Nebraska was still…traditional, to say the least. And, perhaps, that was beneficial in the long run. Years of keeping his head down, ears perked, and legs tense and ready to run paid off. He had made it into med school despite having to check off a box indicating he was afflicted because “You’re so tame!” He’d gotten a job at a decent hospital despite the large, inky black ‘A’ stamped on his file since, “No one would ever be able to tell.” He found a landlord not too far from work that rented to people like him as long as, “They control themselves as you do.” 

It’s nice, far nicer than anything Stephen imagined for himself. He works his way through grunt work, keeps his head down, ears perked, and legs tense and ready to run until, finally, he earns his place in the surgical department as the Afflicted Surgeon. The world swoons, thinking Stephen so brave to spend his days letting the blood of the afflicted run over his hands. How valiant he is to risk exposure to the mutation so that another may continue living. 

And then Tony Stark needed a consult after blasting himself into a wall and giving himself a grade two concussion. And he requested Stephen because “He’s the best.” 

3. Tony Stark was loud, defiant, and openly charming as he strutted around the world flashing his shiny, white teeth. He feared no one and nothing. He went wherever he wanted. He did whatever he pleased. Even now, with Stephen attempting to peer into his dark eyes and check his pupils, Tony winked flirtatiously and asked where Stephen liked to go out for drinks. 

Tony Stark who was the exact opposite of everything an afflicted should be, which was, Stephen realized, his instincts rearing at the presence of another wolf, the perfect way to cover the fact that he was. 

4. Stephen was intrigued. Tony was, in a nearly literal sense, a wolf in sheep’s clothing, and he needed to know more. So, once Tony was discharged, they went out for drinks. It was, grudging as Stephen was to admit it and inflate Tony’s ego, enjoyable. So, they went out again, this time to dinner. And again. And again. They went home together. They went to a movie. The spent the moon together, waking up to sunrise, their nude bodies intertwined. Stephen kept his head up, always keen to catch Tony’s gaze. He let himself grow deaf to the outside world, entirely captivated by the melody that was Tony’s voice. His legs relaxed, all his cares swept away as he let himself sink into love’s warm embrace. 

That was a mistake. 

5. Tony Stark, genius billionaire, and Stephen Strange, mysterious Afflicted Surgeon were seen at a restaurant. They arrived together at a party. They disappeared, together, for days at a time, and returned looking worn with dark circles under their eyes. People noticed. People wondered. The scrutiny began. 

The rule was broken. And, when photos of the couple eating lunch at a café, barely visible twin marks marring their necks, the world was unforgiving.

Send me an AU and I’ll write 5 headcanons.
answer_abstract: I wasn’t sure if you meant werewolves or like…pack wolves? So, I just did werewolves since I had more ideas for that xD Also not everyone is a wolf, sorry.

2. Concealing one’s true nature made for a lonely, isolated, life, but Stephen had fared well thus far. His town in Nebraska was still…traditional, to say the least. And, perhaps, that was beneficial in the long run. Years of keeping his head down, ears perked, and legs tense and ready to run paid off. He had made it into med school despite having to check off a box indicating he was afflicted because “You’re so tame!” He’d gotten a job at a decent hospital despite the large, inky black ‘A’ stamped on his file since, “No one would ever be able to tell.” He found a landlord not too far from work that rented to people like him as long as, “They control themselves as you do.” 

It’s nice, far nicer than anything Stephen imagined for himself. He works his way through grunt work, keeps his head down, ears perked, and legs tense and ready to run until, finally, he earns his place in the surgical department as the Afflicted Surgeon. The world swoons, thinking Stephen so brave to spend his days letting the blood of the afflicted run over his hands. How valiant he is to risk exposure to the mutation so that another may continue living. 

And then Tony Stark needed a consult after blasting himself into a wall and giving himself a grade two concussion. And he requested Stephen because “He’s the best.” 

3. Tony Stark was loud, defiant, and openly charming as he strutted around the world flashing his shiny, white teeth. He feared no one and nothing. He went wherever he wanted. He did whatever he pleased. Even now, with Stephen attempting to peer into his dark eyes and check his pupils, Tony winked flirtatiously and asked where Stephen liked to go out for drinks. 

Tony Stark who was the exact opposite of everything an afflicted should be, which was, Stephen realized, his instincts rearing at the presence of another wolf, the perfect way to cover the fact that he was. 

4. Stephen was intrigued. Tony was, in a nearly literal sense, a wolf in sheep’s clothing, and he needed to know more. So, once Tony was discharged, they went out for drinks. It was, grudging as Stephen was to admit it and inflate Tony’s ego, enjoyable. So, they went out again, this time to dinner. And again. And again. They went home together. They went to a movie. The spent the moon together, waking up to sunrise, their nude bodies intertwined. Stephen kept his head up, always keen to catch Tony’s gaze. He let himself grow deaf to the outside world, entirely captivated by the melody that was Tony’s voice. His legs relaxed, all his cares swept away as he let himself sink into love’s warm embrace. 

That was a mistake. 

5. Tony Stark, genius billionaire, and Stephen Strange, mysterious Afflicted Surgeon were seen at a restaurant. They arrived together at a party. They disappeared, together, for days at a time, and returned looking worn with dark circles under their eyes. People noticed. People wondered. The scrutiny began. 

The rule was broken. And, when photos of the couple eating lunch at a café, barely visible twin marks marring their necks, the world was unforgiving.

Send me an AU and I’ll write 5 headcanons.
trail.content_abstract: I wasn’t sure if you meant werewolves or like…pack wolves? So, I just did werewolves since I had more ideas for that xD Also not everyone is a wolf, sorry.
